title: C Is for Canada
description: C Is for Canada is a book written in the form of emails between two pen pals: Stephanie from the United States and Jacqueline from Canada. Stephanie's school assignment is to write a report about Canada, so Jacqueline writes about the details of her country. Photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: ancestors, caribou, constitution, constitutional monarchy, democracy, heritage, Inuit, Parliament, provinces, republic, territories
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Compound Sentences                : Identify compound sentences used in the text
awareness: Compound Words                : Identify and create compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
